title: Making a ranked team for fun, any rank is welcome!
body:
Everyone is welcome whether you're from Bronze or Diamond.. (I'm Platinum 4)
This isn't a serious team, the idea is just to have fun and enjoy playing in a group and also to improve
Toxic players will not be tolerated as i want to keep this team as friendly as possible
If you're interested add and pm me Tzukuyomi
:D

replies.body: i'm up for some fun games, hola me up..
I'm silver 4... can i join the fun?

Do you accept playing with lvl 10's? :3

(im not actually lvl 10 i just wanted to make an account on oce)
